verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord crucified O mark Thy Holy Cross On motive preference All fond desires On That which self In any form inspires Set Thou that sign of loss Thy Holy Cross{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when the touch Of death is here and there Laid on a thing Most precious in our eyes Let us not wonder Let us recognize The answer to this prayer Thy Holy Cross{/lang-eng}
